00021 #ifndef APPLICATION_H_
00022 #define APPLICATION_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 #include "Array.h"
00026 #include "String.h"
00027 
00028 #include "AppType.h"
00029 
00030 
00031 #define thisapp ::Sylph::Application::self_app
00032 
00033 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00034 
00035 class ApplicationSelf;
00036 class File;
00037 
00038 template<class T> class Array;
00039 
00040 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00041 class Application : public Object {
00042     friend class ApplicationSelf;
00043 public:
00044 
00045     const String location() {
00046         return _location;
00047     }
00048 
00049     static ApplicationSelf * self_app;
00050 
00051     static void init(int argc, char * argv[], char * apple[], AppType type);
00052 
00053 protected:
00054     String _location;
00055 
00056 private:
00057     Application();
00058     virtual ~Application();
00059 
00060 
00061 };
00062 
00063 class ApplicationSelf : public Application {
00064     friend class Application;
00065 public:
00066     const String appName() {
00067         return _appName;
00068     }
00069 
00070     AppType appType();
00071 
00072     void fail(const String reason);
00073     void fail(const String reason, const String file, unsigned int line);
00074 
00075 
00076     virtual const File& bundle() = 0;
00077     virtual const File& resourceDir() = 0;
00078     virtual const File resource(String rsc) = 0;
00079     virtual const File& libraryDir() = 0;
00080     virtual const File& pluginDir() = 0;
00081     virtual const File& plugindisabledDir() = 0;
00082 
00083     virtual const File& systemLibraryDir() = 0;
00084     virtual const File& systemSettings() = 0;
00085     virtual const File& systemSettingsDir() = 0;
00086     virtual const File& systemPluginDir() = 0;
00087     virtual const File& systemPluginDisabledDir() = 0;
00088     virtual const File& systemResourceDir() = 0;
00089     virtual const File systemResource(String rsc) = 0;
00090 
00091     virtual const File& userHome() = 0;
00092 
00093     virtual const File& userLibraryDir() = 0;
00094     virtual const File& userSettings() = 0;
00095     virtual const File& userSettingsDir() = 0;
00096     virtual const File& userPluginDir() = 0;
00097     virtual const File& userPluginDisabledDir() = 0;
00098     virtual const File& userResourceDir() = 0;
00099     virtual const File userResource(String rsc) = 0;
00100 
00101     virtual const File& prefix() = 0;
00102 
00103 protected:
00104     ApplicationSelf() {
00105         _preconstruct();
00106     }
00107     virtual ~ApplicationSelf();
00108 
00109     void _fail(const String appName, const String reason);
00110     void _fail(const String appName, const String reason,
00111             const String file, unsigned int line);
00112 
00113 private:
00114     void _preconstruct();
00115     String _appName;
00116     AppType _appType;
00117 
00118 
00119 };
